Text: @pjones452 This is Season 2 of My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic from iTunes. They are 1280x720 and is contained in .mkv.

Finally. Well, that was a painful download.

I will seed this torrent for the serie's sake. But let me tell you, damoggen, that you are no better than the â€œfucking assolesâ€? which don't seed. You'll learn that a torrent often needs more than a week to start on thepiratebay.
